verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, and unto his sons <WH1121>, and unto all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH1697>: This is the thing which Jehovah <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680>, saying <WH559>,

What <WH376> man <WH376> soever there be of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, that killeth <WH7819> an ox <WH7794>, or lamb <WH3775>, or goat <WH5795>, in the camp <WH4264>, or that killeth <WH7819> it without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>,

and hath not brought <WH935> it unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, to offer <WH7126> it as an oblation <WH7133> unto Jehovah <WH3068> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Jehovah <WH3068>: blood <WH1818> shall be imputed <WH2803> unto that man <WH376>; he hath shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818>; and that man <WH376> shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people <WH5971>:

To the end that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may bring <WH935> their sacrifices <WH2077>, which they sacrifice <WH2076> in the open <WH6440> field <WH7704>, even that they may bring <WH935> them unto Jehovah <WH3068>, unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, unto the priest <WH3548>, and sacrifice <WH2076> them for sacrifices <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH8002> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall sprinkle <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196> of Jehovah <WH3068> at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and burn <WH6999> the fat <WH2459> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And they shall no more sacrifice <WH2076> their sacrifices <WH2077> unto the he-goats <WH8163>, after <WH310> which they play the harlot <WH2181>. This shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> unto them throughout their generations <WH1755>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> unto them <WH376>, Whatsoever man there be of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, or of the strangers <WH1616> that sojourn <WH1481> among <WH8432> them <WH5927>, that offereth a burnt-offering <WH5930> or sacrifice <WH2077>,

and bringeth <WH935> it not unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, to sacrifice <WH6213> it unto Jehovah <WH3068>; that man <WH376> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people <WH5971>.

And whatsoever man <WH376> there be of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, or of the strangers <WH1616> that sojourn <WH1481> among <WH8432> them <WH398>, that eateth any manner of blood <WH1818>, I will set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> against that soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> blood <WH1818>, and will cut him off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people <WH5971>.

For the life <WH5315> of the flesh <WH1320> is in the blood <WH1818>; and I have given <WH5414> it to you upon the altar <WH4196> to make atonement <WH3722> for your souls <WH5315>: for it is the blood <WH1818> that maketh atonement <WH3722> by reason of the life <WH5315>.

Therefore I said <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, No soul <WH5315> of you shall eat <WH398> blood <WH1818>, neither shall any stranger <WH1616> that sojourneth <WH1481> among <WH8432> you eat <WH398> blood <WH1818>.

And whatsoever man <WH376> there be of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, or of the strangers <WH1616> that sojourn <WH1481> among <WH8432> them <WH6718>, who taketh in hunting <WH6679> any beast <WH2416> or bird <WH5775> that may be eaten <WH398>; he shall pour <WH8210> out the blood <WH1818> thereof <WH3680>, and cover it with dust <WH6083>.

For as to the life <WH5315> of all flesh <WH1320>, the blood <WH1818> thereof is all one with the life <WH5315> thereof <WH559>: therefore I said unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, Ye shall eat <WH398> the blood <WH1818> of no manner of flesh <WH1320>; for the life <WH5315> of all flesh <WH1320> is the blood <WH1818> thereof <WH398>: whosoever eateth it shall be cut off <WH3772>.

And every soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> that which dieth <WH5038> of itself <WH2966>, or that which is torn of beasts <WH249>, whether he be home-born or a sojourner <WH1616>, he shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and bathe <WH3526> himself in water <WH4325>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>: then shall he be clean <WH2891>.
But if he wash <WH3526> them not <WH7364>, nor bathe his flesh <WH1320>, then he shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity <WH5771>.
